column1: So UFOs, stupid TikTok videos, conflicting #coronavirus stories over just a few days- just going to go write in my make believe land where it could be the end of the world. #amwritingfantasy #WritingCommnunity

Sure they can. Filming & uploading it for likes is fishing for ego strokes, being an exhibitionist, not just 'blowing off steam'. Get a grip. And this antic, when ppl are sick and can't see loved ones, is in such poor taste I can't believe you try to defend it. #coronavirus

THIS. @GovInslee decides he's a doctor now, more than the doctors, nurses and administrators who know how to, you know, practice medicine. #coronavirus Ppl have been waiting for tests/procedures, now more obstacles!
Except when it comes to coronavirus response, then we're way down the list behind a lot of other countries that have done better. Because Trump is an awful leader.
Number 1 in Deaths of civilians killed by police. #1 in coronavirus and most of all #1 in starting conflicts around the world I see why Trump doesn't want to be second anywhere.
The corona virus does not care if ur a party of 3
